data.name: Leap of Faith
data.detailed_description:
Synopsis
Having spent 2 years wondering why your girlfriend left your seemingly perfect relationship out of the blue, you finally decide to move forward. And while you're opening your eyes to the world, it seems to be opening it's eyes to you as well.

Before long you've connected with 6 different girls, all with their own stories to tell. From that girl you save from a horrible fate, to the superstar pop singer - even the returning ex. girlfriend. This is the story about your journey together. Which, through choices and opportunities, will lead you down a path you never could have imagined.

Features
The first seven Chapters of Leap of Faith consists of 10.100 static renders and over 67.000 animated frames full HD - 1920x1080 resoultion, with about 56.000 lines of source and dialogue, using RenPy as engine.
In addition to the normal VN choice menus, you will have to interract with your phone as a tool to explore opportunities, or even discover them. Leap of Faith does not offer you every experience in it by advancing through dialogue alone.

Future content
Chapter 8 will be released when ready, and your game will update for free when it is released.

data.short_description: You thought it was going to be just another summer. You were wrong.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Kernel 3.x+ distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only and contains visual representations of sexual content in form of images and animations (vaginal, anal and oral sexual acts).

All sexual scenes are consensual, and all characters are over the age of 18 years old.

Even if the general mood of the game is happy, it handles the darker subject of depression and an attempted suicide. If you are looking for a fun/wholesome game only, you might want to reconsider playing.
